description: Change of use, including alterations to existing mezzanine level, to provide for an indoor go karting facility, with ancillary bar and staff facilities (Sui Generis); external alterations to front elevation and associated parking (Departure Planning Application)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers 11723-PLF-020 C, 11723-PLF-021 A, 11723-PLF_022 A  and 11723-PLF_23 unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The use of the premises hereby approved shall not commence before 09 :00 on any day and shall cease at 22:30 on Sunday to Thursday, and at 23:00 on Fridays and Saturdays.  Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with policies 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Adopted Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The rating noise level emitted from the proposed mechanical plant and machinery at the development, as assessed under BS4142: 1997, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by at least 5 dBA as measured at 3.5 m from the nearest ground floor sensitive facade and 1m from upper floor noise sensitive facades, during the relevant periods of operation.  Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policy 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | This permission shall be personal to Go Karting for Fun Limited for the purposes of an indoor go karting operation and shall not endure for the benefit of the land. On Go Karting for Fun Limited vacating the premises, the use of the land shall revert back to Class B8 warehouse use.  Reason: To enable the local planning authority to maintain strict control over the nature of the use in order to restrict the use of the premises to one compatible with the surrounding area, in accordance with policies 1.(c), (d) and (e), 1.2 (d), 2.5 (d) & 6.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 4C of the Ealing adopted Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policies 2.15, 3.1, 3.2, 3.1 and 4.7 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | Details should be submitted for approval before the first operation of the use, for a suitable mechanical ventilation system, to ensure doors and windows are kept closed during hot weather and the plant associated with this system will be silenced to a standard not exceeding LFNR 35 Leq,5min (octaves) or LFNR 30 Leq,5min (one third octaves) measured or calculated at 1m from the nearest facade of the nearest affected noise sensitive premises  Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policy 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The equipment shall be installed and constructed in accordance with the approved scheme and recommendations made in the Hann Tucker acoustic report dated 24th February 2014, ref: 19789/JR/A and shall be implemented in their entirety before use commences, and permanently retained thereafter.   Reason: To comply with the terms of the application and in the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policy 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The use shall be conducted in accordance with the Teamsport Operation and Management statement dated February 2014 and shall only operate with electrically powered karts, and at no time shall petrol powered karts be used.  Reason: To comply with the terms of the application and in the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties and in accordance with Interim SPG 10, policy 1.1 (e) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), and policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The framework Travel Plan shall be continuously monitored and operated by Teamsport for the lifetime of the use.  Reason: In order to promote sustainable transport modes and encourage the use of   alternatives to car travel in accordance with policy 3.1 of the DPD and policy 1.1 of the Ealing Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012). | The development shall be undertaken in accordance with reccomendation of the Energy & Sustainability Statement dated November 2013, which shall be completed prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved and thereafter permanently retained and maintained, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.    Reason: To ensure that the development hereby approved is energy efficient and to contribute to the avoidance of need for new fossil fuel or other primary energy generation capacity and to reduce emissions of greenhouse gases,in accordance with the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies  5.1-5.7 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
